modName: Enhanced Quests - Ill met by moonlight - DELETED
summary: Will eventually be apart of a series of mods to make some more interesting quests in Skyrim's vanilla game, although currently only modifying rewards. Work in progress. Feedback appreciated.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]Enhanced Quests
[size=4]Ill met by moonlight[/size][/size]﻿[/center]
This mod currently modifies Hircine's ring and the Savior's hide as I am new to modding it make take me some time to become antiquated with the process of editing a quest, so advice is something I hope to receive.

Saviors hide:
armor-32  weight-same  value-3000
+ 15% magic resist
+ 95 stamina
+ 160 carryweight
+ 6% health regen
+ 15 sneak
Ring of Hircine:
increased additional transformations magnitude to 1 from .25
+ 10 unarmed
+ 15 marksman
+ 10 bow stagger

Plans:
[list]
[*]change Hircine's cursed ring to be more interesting/re-modify the normal ring

[*]add more challenge to hunting the stag
[*]replace Hircine's aspects
[*]expand the hunt of Sinding

[*]change models and textures

[*]add new quests??
[/list]
There should be minimal confections right now
author: Blamebandit
